leacrosscode:Hit.NAME: Hit
leacrosscode:Hit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the front ennemi. Gain !SP_G! SP.

leacrosscode:SphereSaw.NAME: Sphere Saw
leacrosscode:SphereSaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the front ennemi. Apply !M! Vulnerable.

leacrosscode:Hit&Block.NAME: Hit & Block
leacrosscode:Hit&Block.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the front ennemi. Gain !M! Protection. Gain !SP_G! SP.

leacrosscode:TripleHits.NAME: Triple hits
leacrosscode:TripleHits.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D!x2 damage to the front ennemi. Then, deal !M! damage to ALL ennemis. Gain !SP_G! SP.

leacrosscode:VPRCharge.NAME: VPR Chargé !
leacrosscode:VPRCharge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to an ennemi. Apply !M! Target. Gain !SP_G! SP.

leacrosscode:ShockJolt.NAME: Shock Jolt !
leacrosscode:ShockJolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL ennemis. Apply !M! Jolt to everyone.

leacrosscode:BoltDrink.NAME: Bolt Drink
leacrosscode:BoltDrink.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Max HP and draw !M! card. Gain 1 Jolt. NL Exhaust.

leacrosscode:Accumulation.NAME: Accumulation
leacrosscode:Accumulation.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards then discard up to !D! cards. Gain 1 SP for each card discarded.

leacrosscode:StaticDash.NAME: Static Dash
leacrosscode:StaticDash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Draw !M! cards. Apply !J! Jolt to ALL ennemis. NL Exhaust.

leacrosscode:VPRSpam.NAME: VPR Spam
leacrosscode:VPRSpam.DESCRIPTION: Homing !M! bullets (!D! damage each). Gain !SP_G! SP.

leacrosscode:LimitlessSpam.NAME: Limitless Spam
leacrosscode:LimitlessSpam.DESCRIPTION: Each time you hit with a bullet, gain 1 temp Strength.
leacrosscode:LimitlessSpam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Bullet to your hand. NL Each time you hit with a bullet, gain 1 temp Strength.

leacrosscode:Bullet.NAME: Bullet
leacrosscode:Bullet.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Homing !M! bullet (!D! damage). NL Exhaust.

leacrosscode:Flashback.NAME: Flashback
leacrosscode:Flashback.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Put !M! card from your discard into your hand. It cost 1 less this combat. NL Exhaust.

leacrosscode:Bye.NAME: Bye
leacrosscode:Bye.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain X+1 SP and X+1 strength. NL End your turn.(prob par rapport à l'effet réel de la carte)
leacrosscode:Bye.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain X+2 SP and 2X strength. NL End your turn.

leacrosscode:AmberBreaker.NAME: Amber Breaker
leacrosscode:AmberBreaker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! x!M! damage and apply 2x!M! Jolt to the front ennemi.

leacrosscode:SpinDance.NAME: Spin Dance
leacrosscode:SpinDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL ennemies. Gain !SP_G! SP.

leacrosscode:HedgehagFarming.NAME: Hedgehag Farming
leacrosscode:HedgehagFarming.DESCRIPTION: Permanently upgrade 2 times a card in your hand and remove this from your deck permanently. NL Exhaust.

leacrosscode:RockSmash.NAME: Rock Smash
leacrosscode:RockSmash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Deal !D! damage to the front ennemi. Vigor also affect block gain. NL Gain !SP_G! SP.

leacrosscode:OverloadCooling.NAME: Overload Cooling
leacrosscode:OverloadCooling.DESCRIPTION: Restore !M! points of each element. Gain 3 Vigor.

leacrosscode:Durian.NAME: Durian
leacrosscode:Durian.DESCRIPTION: Heal 8 HP and gain 2 Strength. !M! uses before removing this from your deck permanently. NL Exhaust.

leacrosscode:PreparingAssault.NAME: Preparing Assault
leacrosscode:PreparingAssault.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, add 3 bullet in your hand.
leacrosscode:PreparingAssault.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, add 3 bullet+ in your hand.

leacrosscode:OneMoreTime.NAME: One more time
leacrosscode:OneMoreTime.DESCRIPTION: Homing !D! damage for each Bullet type cards used this fight. NL Exhaust.

leacrosscode:TargetAbsorb.NAME: Target Absorb
leacrosscode:TargetAbsorb.DESCRIPTION: Absorb Target from ALL ennemis and gain !M! Strength for each target. NL Exhaust.

leacrosscode:Hackgey.NAME: Hackgey
leacrosscode:Hackgey.DESCRIPTION: Apply -!M! Strength and !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

leacrosscode:SapStrength.NAME: Sap Strength
leacrosscode:SapStrength.DESCRIPTION: Steal !M! Strength to an ennemi this turn. NL Exhaust.

leacrosscode:Sonar.NAME: Sonar
leacrosscode:Sonar.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Mark to ALL ennemies. Then, apply !M! Target on ennemi.

leacrosscode:WaveBounce.NAME: Wave Bounce
leacrosscode:WaveBounce.DESCRIPTION: Hit all ennemis 1 per 1 dealing !D! damage and applying 2 Mark. Deal !M!% of damage and apply !M!% of Mark each hit. NL Gain !SP_G! SP.

leacrosscode:MemoryLost.NAME: Memory Lost
leacrosscode:MemoryLost.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, exhaust a random card in your hand.

leacrosscode:Shocked.NAME: Shocked -- MARCHE PAS ENCORE
leacrosscode:Shocked.DESCRIPTION: While in hand, you can't play any attack.

leacrosscode:AFK.NAME: AFK
leacrosscode:AFK.DESCRIPTION: Retain your hand this turn. NL Gain !SP_G! SP. NL Exhaust.
leacrosscode:AFK.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain your hand this turn. NL Gain !SP_G! SP.

leacrosscode:FieryHit.NAME: FieryHit
leacrosscode:FieryHit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the front ennemi. Apply !M! Burn. NL Gain !SP_G! SP.

leacrosscode:Ctron.NAME: C'tron
leacrosscode:Ctron.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Add 1 Bullet into your hand for each card discarded.
leacrosscode:Ctron.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Add 1 Bullet+ into your hand for each card discarded.

leacrosscode:Emilienator.NAME: Emilienator
leacrosscode:Emilienator.DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, deal !M! melee damage to the front ennemi.
leacrosscode:Emilienator.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of each turn, deal !M! melee damage to the front ennemi.

leacrosscode:CircuitPoint.NAME: Circuit Point
leacrosscode:CircuitPoint.DESCRIPTION: Gain a card reward. Each card has 65% to be T1 and 35% T2 Combat Art. Remove it from your deck.
leacrosscode:CircuitPoint.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain a card reward. Each card has 50% to be T1, 40% T2 and 10% T3 Combat Art. Remove it from your deck.

leacrosscode:FrozenStance.NAME: Frozen Stance
leacrosscode:FrozenStance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! Protection. Apply !M! weak and !M! chill to all ennemis who intends to attack you.

leacrosscode:PhantomDash.NAME: Phantom Dash
leacrosscode:PhantomDash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! Blur. Permanently increase this card's Block by 1. NL Exhaust.

leacrosscode:PentafistStyle.NAME: Pentafist Style
leacrosscode:PentafistStyle.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. Each time you play a dash, you gain 1 Protection.

leacrosscode:TribladerStyle.NAME: Triblader Style
leacrosscode:TribladerStyle.DESCRIPTION: Vigor proc twice on melee attack. Gain 5 Vigor.
leacrosscode:TribladerStyle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Vigor proc twice on melee attack. Gain !M! Vigor.

leacrosscode:QuadroguardStyle.NAME: Quadroguard Style
leacrosscode:QuadroguardStyle.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Protection. Protection are divide by 2 at the start of your turn.

leacrosscode:GumGum.NAME: GumGum
leacrosscode:GumGum.DESCRIPTION: +3 Wave -2 Shock NL Gain !B! Block but lose 1 Protection.

leacrosscode:ThunderDart.NAME: Thunder Dart
leacrosscode:ThunderDart.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Jolt to ALL ennemies.

leacrosscode:DivingSpark.NAME: Diving Spark
leacrosscode:DivingSpark.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Jolt. NL Consume its Jolt to deal him 3 Shock damage per stack consumed.

leacrosscode:HexacastStyle.NAME: Hexacast Style
leacrosscode:HexacastStyle.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Mark to a random ennemi when you play a BULLET. NL Protection don't protect you anymore and instead gives you Block.

leacrosscode:Barrier.NAME: Barrier
leacrosscode:Barrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and 3 Protection. NL At the start of your turn, transform your prot x !M! into block.

leacrosscode:Sparkplosion.NAME: Sparkplosion
leacrosscode:Sparkplosion.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Jolt to an ennemi and 2 Jolt to a random ennemi.

leacrosscode:PolarityHack.NAME: Polarity Hack
leacrosscode:PolarityHack.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Jolt to an ennemi. Jolt can't reduce more than 2 per turn on it.
